title: Contemporary Cleveland Stay in the Heart of the City near Rock & Roll Hall of Fame
description: Explore Ohio's vibrant, industrial-chic centre with a stay at InterContinental Cleveland, an IHG Hotel. Located in the heart of downtown, this hotel is minutes from the Cleveland Museum of Art, the Natural History Museum and the buzzing Rock & Roll Hall of Fame. Keep up with your routine at the onsite fitness centre, then sample light American classics at North Coast Cafe, dine on decadent international cuisine at Table 45 Restaurant or savour handcrafted cocktails at Table 45 Bar & Lounge
offer_address: 9801 Carnegie Avenue, Cleveland, Ohio 44106, United States

title: Tranquil Ohio City Retreat in the heart of Cleveland's University Circle
description: Nestled amidst the prestigious Cleveland Clinic campus, InterContinental Suites Hotel Cleveland, an IHG Hotel, provides an elevated, yet inviting, home-away-from-home in which to recuperate and relax. Immerse yourself in the vibrant city, with the charming Little Italy, iconic Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and the revered Cleveland Museum of Art all just moments away. Culinary excellence awaits your return, with the Italian-inspired C2 restaurant, bar and lounge serving a delectable array of dishes and sophisticated aperitifs.
location_description: InterContinental Suites Hotel Cleveland, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 8800 Euclid Avenue, Cleveland, Ohio 44106, United States

title: Charming Cleveland Downtown Heritage Escape with Restaurant & Gym
description: Housed within a beautifully restored original façade, Kimpton Schofield Hotel, an IHG Hotel, is the ideal starting point for exploring the vibrant city of Cleveland. Enjoy impeccable yet eclectic styling, designed to complement the storied past of the early 1900’s building. Sample classic American dishes with a fresh twist at the hotel’s vibrant restaurant Betts, serving up breakfast through to late-night bites or unwind with a quick workout in the fully-equipped gym.
location_description: Kimpton Schofield Hotel, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 2000 East Ninth Street, Cleveland, Ohio 44115, United States
